original_text: He will love you and he will bless you. He will give you many children so that you become a large nation. He will cause your fields to give you plenty of food: grain, wine and olive oil. He will cause your cows, sheep and goats to have many babies. That is how he will bless you in the land that he promised your ancestors to give you.
korean_text: 곧 너를 사랑하시고 복을 주사 너를 번성하게 하시되 네게 주리라고 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 땅에서 네 소생에게 은혜를 베푸시며 네 토지 소산과 곡식과 포도주와 기름을 풍성하게 하시고 네 소와 양을 번식하게 하시리니

sentences.original_text: He will give you many children
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신에게 많은 자녀를 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that you become a large nation
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 당신은 큰 민족이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will cause your fields to give you plenty of food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신의 밭이 풍성한 음식을 내게 하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will cause your cows, sheep and goats
That is how he will bless you
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 그는 당신에게 복을 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: in the land that he promised your ancestors
